title: Installing Error
body:
So in short, my league of legends got uninstalled and I'm trying to install it. But right after the terms, the installation stops and theres a error dialog that says "Failed to create the control FAQ_Hyperlink on the dialog AdobeAirInfoDlg."

Anyone know how to fix this?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It is possible that there might be an issue with your OS Permissions that isn't allowing League to install properly.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  Some of the steps there may seem fairly simple, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this.

Reply back and let me know if it persists!
thx but I already solved my problem. I downloaded the alternative download, the old installer i think.
